text: @KagutaMuseveni @MinofHealthUG It's becoming very boring all you do is simply repeating yourself nothing new why don't you go into self quarantine at your age of 75years old you are more vulnerable to #CoronavirusPandemic,leave the experts to do their work please https://t.co/uKLvuhLs0n

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
